title: How can geospatial software simplify field work for utilities?
description: Adrian McNulty of IQGeo discussed AI-powered geospatial software at DTECH 2026 in San Diego, California, aimed at streamlining utility workflows.
content: Adrian McNulty of IQGeo discussed AI-powered geospatial software at DTECH 2026 in San Diego, California, aimed at streamlining utility workflows.
